text: Kanti nakubantu bakwaThamûd Sathumela umzalwana wabo, uSâlih1. Wathi kubo: “Hini na bantu bakuthi! Nqulani uAllâh, aninathixo wumbi ngaphandle kwaKhe. Yena Wanikhupha emhlabeni Wanizinzisa kwakuwo, ke ngoko celani itarhu kuYe nibuyele kuYe ngenguquko. Inene iNkosi yam Ikufutshane, yaye Iyaphendula.”
